name: Journey In The Silver Wood
description:
Journey In The Silver Wood is a Visual Novel fantasy game that draws inspiration from mythological stories such as The Odyssey as well as  Russian folklore, as in the story of Baba Yaga. In the game, you play as Nina: an ungrateful and arrogant girl who lives with her parents outside of a small town in the woods. Nina is tested on her journey through the game and player choice will determine if she makes it out of her story a hero. The game has two endings.

This project was made in two months

Designed by: Sasha Tschernisch (@SashaTschernisch on itch.io)
